title: The Secret Treasure of a Temple
body: Once upon a time in a small village nestled amidst the majestic mountains, there stood a mysterious temple that was said to hold unimaginable powers. The villagers believed that this temple was guarded by divine spirits who protected the secret treasure hidden within its walls. One fine day, a curious 10-year-old boy named Rohan stumbled upon a clue that led him on an extraordinary adventure. Little did he know that this journey would change his life forever.

twists.title: The Enchanted Forest
twists.body: Rohan followed the clue and found himself in an enchanted forest. The trees whispered ancient secrets, and the animals spoke in riddles. As he ventured deeper, he encountered a mischievous talking squirrel who offered him a choice: continue on the path or turn back. What will Rohan choose?

twists.title: The Ghostly Encounter
twists.body: While exploring the temple, Rohan stumbled upon a hidden chamber filled with ghostly apparitions. These spirits were trapped between the realms of the living and the dead, seeking redemption. One of them, a kind-hearted spirit named Maya, offered to guide Rohan through the treacherous trials that lay ahead. Will Rohan trust the ghostly presence?

twists.title: The Betrayal
twists.body: As Rohan got closer to the temple's secret treasure, he discovered that his own best friend, Aryan, had been secretly plotting to steal it. Aryan, driven by greed, revealed his true colors and challenged Rohan to a dangerous duel. Will Rohan be able to outsmart his friend and protect the treasure?
